articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Wisong Scientists Street
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Wisong Scientists Street
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the construction site of the Wisong Scientists Street. 
					 He looked round different places of the construction site to learn about the construction. 
					
					 He was greatly pleased that the eye-opening speed of construction, Korea-speed, was being created through a mass competition in all places of the construction site. 
					
					 Stressing the need to effectively use the area of the housing district, he said that scientists would like to see plots for sideline farming and green houses built well in the places between apartment houses.
					
					 He gave instructions to complete the arrangement of the environment before the rainy season by simultaneously pushing forward under a plan the planting of turf and trees of good species and the building of roads and walk-ways in the housing district in keeping with the progress made in the construction. 
					
					 He dropped in at various flats of apartment houses Nos. 5 and 9. Noting that the inner structures were built well to the convenience of settlers, he praised the soldier-builders for constructing them well as required by the design approved by the party.
					
					 Telling officials to provide scientists with  houses impeccable in any aspect, he said to this end it was necessary to reflect the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science and the Juche-oriented idea of architectural beauty in all structures.
					
					 "What is the most important for the construction of apartment houses for scientists is to direct primary attention to ensuring quality", he noted, calling for completing them as the best ones under the slogan of responsibility for the safety of the structures and guarantee of their absolute quality for all eternity.
					
					 He instructed officials to raise a strong wind of ideological and agitation campaigns, bearing in mind that the greatest potentials for creation and innovations and the master key to working miracles lie  in giving the fullest play to the mental power of the masses. 
					
					 "It is the promise the party made to scientists to complete the construction till the anniversary of the founding of the party this year," he said, expressing expectation and belief that the builders would successfully wind up the construction of the Wisong Scientists Street as scheduled. 
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice-Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA; Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the WPK; Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK; Army Lieut. General Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the National Defence Commission; and Army Lieut. General Kim Jong Gwan, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to May Day Stadium under Remodeling
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to May Day Stadium under Remodeling
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and  supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the remodeling site of the May Day Stadium.
					 Going round various places of the stadium, he acquainted himself in detail with the progress made in the remodeling project and gave instructions for facilitating it.
					
					 He praised the builders for bringing about signal successes in every work site.
					
					 Noting that the stadium associated with the leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il is an important place for developing the nation's sports and making a positive contribution to the people's cultural and emotional life, he called for successfully remodeling it as an icon of the country's sports facilities and stadium befitting the appearance of the highly civilized nation.
					
					 He stressed that in order to remodel the stadium as a modern one to be proud of in the world, it was necessary to carry out the project in a creative and innovative manner from the standpoint of Juche and with world insight and vision.
					
					 Pointing out one by one the objects on which efforts should be focused in the remodeling project, he said it is possible to turn the stadium into sports facilities based on the Juche-oriented architecture only when the spectators' seats, its sports ground and various service facilities, in particular, are remodeled in an impeccable manner.
					
					 Calling upon the builders to complete the remodeling project by the anniversary of the founding of the party this year, he expressed expectation and belief that they would qualitatively wind it up as scheduled as intended by the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					  He was accompanied by KPA Vice-Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA; Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the WPK; Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK; Army Lieut. General Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the National Defence Commission; and Army Lieut. General Kim Jong Gwan, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces.

articles.title: Congratulations to Spanish King
articles.content:
Congratulations to Spanish King
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Friday sent a congratulatory message to Felipe VI upon his enthronement as king of Spain.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Spain would grow stronger in the common interests and desires of the two peoples.

articles.title: Congratulations to Colombian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Colombian President
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Juan Manuel Santos upon his reelection as president of Colombia.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to favorably develop in the mutual interests and wished the Colombian president great success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme Prosecutor's Office of the Russian Federation headed by Vice-Director Yuri Gulryagin left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: President of People's Assembly of Syria Meets DPRK Government Delegation
articles.content:
President of People's Assembly of Syria Meets DPRK Government Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Mohammad Jihad Al Laham, president of the People's Assembly of Syria, met and had a talk with the DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong which paid a courtesy call on him at the building of the People's Assembly on June 19.
					 He said that the comradely relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il together with President Hafez Al-Assad have been invariably carried forward and developed by President Bashar Al-Assad and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The outcome of the recent presidential election clearly proved that President Bashar Al-Assad and the Syrian people think alike.
					
					 He condemned the evermore undisguised application of the double-standard by the U.S. and the West interfering in the internal affairs of the independent countries and infringing upon their interests in violation of international law.
					
					 He expressed his will to further boost the cooperation with the friendly Korean friends in the international arenas.
					
					 Present there were personages concerned of the People's Assembly and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates and the DPRK ambassador to Syria.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in provinces, cities (districts) and counties on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Reporters said that the 50th anniversary of his start of work at the Party Central Committee, the supreme staff of revolution, marked an important occasion for glorifying forever his exploits performed in the party building and a great event demonstrating the bright future of the WPK.
					
					 They stressed that he was the peerless elder statesman and outstanding leader who dynamically advanced the cause of building the Juche-oriented party and victoriously hewed out the road of socialism, the untrodden path, to realize the ideal of the popular masses for independence.
					
					 They called upon all the party members and people to make a great leap forward on all fronts for building a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding high the red party flag of Juche associated with the whole lives of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and reflecting the dreams and ideals of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the meetings were officials of the local party, power and economic bodies and working organizations and other people.

articles.title: 8th Pyongyang Department Store No.1 Commodity Exhibition
articles.content:
8th Pyongyang Department Store No.1 Commodity Exhibition
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The 8th Pyongyang Department Store No. 1 commodity exhibition was held here on June 17-19, drawing many visitors for various kinds of quality mass consumption goods.
					 What caught one's eye were clothes presented by the Unha Guidance Bureau and the Pyongyang Municipal Garment Industry Management Bureau.
					
					 The Unha Guidance Bureau presented to the exhibition 52 kinds of over 1 600 pieces.
					
					 The Ryongsong, Sunan and Tongdaewon garment factories put on display different kinds of sportswear, swimsuits and men's shirts.
					
					 On display at the exhibition were many kinds of sports shoes with different colors manufactured by the Hamhung, Kangso, Sinuiju, Pothonggang and Ryuwon shoes factory.
					
					 Among those exhibits were a large number of other goods including textile goods, grass works, electrical appliances, kitchen utensil, etc.

articles.title: DPRK Football Fans Regard Spanish "Tiki-Taka" as Worn-out
articles.content:
DPRK Football Fans Regard Spanish "Tiki-Taka" as Worn-out
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The FIFA World Cup Brazil 2014 is drawing great attention of football fans and televiewers in the DPRK.
					 But it seems nothing can overpower the shock given to most of them due to the Spanish team's early exit.
					
					 In this regard, Yu Myong Uk, an official of the DPRK Football Association, told KCNA:
					
					 Even a strong team may have a bitter experience of defeat.
					
					 But, I am very surprised at the Spanish team's disgraceful defeat, as the Dutch team has been ranked far below the Spanish team in teams list.
					
					 It seems to me that Spanish "Tiki-Taka" is going bankrupt.
					
					 Pak Chol Nam, a teacher of Pyongyang International Football School, said:
					
					 The Spanish team's defeat gave me a lesson that it is most important to grasp the tactics of rivals and smartly counter them.
					
					 I will further study together with my trainees lessons and experiences gained in the on-going World Cup to put the training on a more scientific basis.
					
					 Ryang Min Ho, a section chief of the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute, said:
					
					 I am closely following the result of every match.
					
					 The Spanish team's loss is the most exceptional one for all employees of my institute.
					
					 I called my friend in the Cheyuk Sinmun (Sports newspaper) to say my opinion. My friend told me that now many football fans in the country are sending messages or making phone calls to his office to express their feelings or propose creative opinions on developing the football of the nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Park Geun Hye of Designating Mun Chang Guk as Candidate for "Prime Minister"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Park Geun Hye of Designating Mun Chang Guk as Candidate for "Prime Minister"
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Park Geun Hye designated former chief editor of Choongang Ilbo Mun Chang Guk as a candidate for the puppet prime minister. A spokesman for Chongwadae, announcing it, talked nonsense that Mun "has made efforts to clean up deep-rooted evils of society through his cool-headed criticism and reasonable proposal" and "will properly implement administrative tasks such as the reforms of society in public interests and termination of abnormal things on the basis of his prominent insight and propelling power".
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday terms it a sheer lie.
					
					 Mun is a reptile media man who has written articles currying favor with the U.S., Japan and puppet rulers for decades, the commentary says, and goes on: 
					
					 Many civic and public organizations and personages of the religious, academic and media circles are demanding Mun give up his candidacy. The designation of Mun as a candidate for the "prime minister" is plunging the whole land of south Korea into a "political upheaval".
					
					 Park designated Mun as a candidate for the "prime minister", going against the people's mindset because he is a confrontation maniac.
					
					 Mun talked nonsense that "the north would collapse in line with the providence of God at a time when nobody can predict" and "dialogue and negotiations between the south and the north were unnecessary". 
					
					 Mun was labeled an architect of the "theory about the collapse of the north". However, Park, who has never opened her mouth without saying about "confidence-building process" and "Dresden declaration", designated him as a candidate for the "prime minister". In the long run, it is little short of declaring at home and abroad that Park will not have dialogue and negotiations with the north.
					
					 If Park tries to escalate "confrontation with social system in the north" by taking such die-hard confrontation maniacs as Mun under her wing, she will be sternly judged by the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Crackdown under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Crackdown under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime is frantically cracking down on protesters demanding the probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The south Korean security authorities on June 16 suddenly arrested a citizen who presided over a press conference demanding the release of those who were taken to a police station while launching an action for the probe into the truth behind the ferry sinking accident.
					
					 The police arrested more than 300 citizens for two months after the ferry disaster.
					
					 Running high in south Korea is the denunciation and protest of people of all socials standings against such suppression by the puppet authorities.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Designating Pro-Japanese Lackey as Prime Minister
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Designating Pro-Japanese Lackey as Prime Minister 
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations including the Solidarity for Implementing Justice of History held a press conference in Seoul on June 12 in protest against the designation of a pro-Japanese lackey as puppet prime minister, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Chamsesang.
					 At the press conference speakers said that reckless remarks of Mun Chang Guk who was designated as "prime minister" were based on his neo-conservative outlook on history beautifying the pro-Japanese elements and dictatorship.
					
					 The designation of Mun as a candidate for "prime minister" is neither a simple mistake in personnel affairs nor the issue which can be settled through the withdrawal of the designation, they said.
					
					 They urged Park Geun Hye to apologize to the people for spawning such controversy.

articles.title: Ultra-Rightist Conservative Accused of Writing Book Justifying Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Ultra-Rightist Conservative Accused of Writing Book Justifying Sexual Slavery
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A book insulting victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and justifying the crimes related to it came off the press in south Korea, stunning the people of different social standings, said the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 The book written by a professor at Sejong University who is an ultra-rightist conservative was published in August last year.
					
					 On June 16, victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army came out for a legal action against the author and the publishing house. 
					
					 They condemned the author for defaming the victims of the sexual slavery and inflicting mental pain upon them.
					
					 On the day, they filed a suit in the court against the author and the publishing house claiming damages on charge of libel.

articles.title: Candidate for PM Urged to Give Up His Candidacy
articles.content:
Candidate for PM Urged to Give Up His Candidacy
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korea are strongly urging Mun Chang Guk to give up his candidacy for the puppet prime minister.
					 The Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation grouping more than 120 organizations and the Citizens Federation for Economy and Justice held press conferences in Seoul on June 16 respectively.
					
					 Mun staged the charade of making an apology for his past reckless remarks but this was nothing but a poor excuse, they charged.
					
					 They urged Mun to give up his candidacy of his own accord.
					
					 The Council of the south Korean Buddhist Jogye Order also held a press conference in Seoul on June 17 at which it demanded the withdrawal of the designation of a candidate for "prime minister".
					
					 105 Christians on June 18 issued a declaration in protest against the designation.
					
					 At least 20 lawmakers from the Democratic Alliance for New Politics on June 17 started one-by-one demo demanding Mun give up his candidacy of his own accord. They held that the designation of Mun is contrary to common sense and an act of inviting international disgrace.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies in Myanmar, Peru
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies in Myanmar, Peru 
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of a political party of Myanmar and personages of Peru visited the DPRK embassies in their countries on June 5 and 11 to congratulate the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 A delegation of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, president of the C.C., the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, curator of Kim Jong Suk Library of Peru, chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and other personages laid floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the their full-length pictures and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 The head of the Myanmar party delegation who is a member of the party's Central Committee said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was the great leader who developed the WPK into the invincible steel-strong party, turned the DPRK into the political, ideological and military power with his unique Songun politics and made undying contributions to the cause of global independence. 
					
					 Under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un the WPK and the Korean people are dynamically advancing along the road indicated by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 We are convinced that the WPK and the Korean people would win only victory in the future, too.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in Dandong, China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in Dandong, China
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia exhibition took place in Dandong, China on June 12 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present at the opening ceremony were personages and horticulturists of China and citizens of Dandong. Present there on invitation were the consul general and staff members of the DPRK consulate general and a delegation of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The general manager of the Dandong Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse said:
					
					 My greenhouse has made positive efforts to let the Chinese people know better about the immortal exploits of the peerless great men through the exhibition.
					
					 The work for cultivating and propagating Kimjongilia is being done worldwide in the new century.
					
					 Beauty and elegance of Kimjongilia are shining as it goes by the august name of a peerless great man.
					
					 We will devote our lives to widely propagating the immortal flower of praising the great man.
					
					 The manager of a Chinese company said that Kimjongilia will be in full bloom in the hearts of the world people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Newspapers 
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups illustrated with portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il to mark the 50th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The Iranian paper Iran News on June 7 said in an article titled "Exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed in party building will shine long":
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il devoted his all to developing the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung in the whole period of leading it. He consolidated the WPK organizationally and ideologically and turned it into the guiding force of the Songun revolution. 
					
					 The exploits Kim Jong Il performed in the party building will shine long with socialist Korea winning victories. 
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on June 6 carried the following article titled "WPK and General Secretary Kim Jong Il":
					
					 The idea and line of Kim Jong Il serve as the eternal guidelines of the WPK. 
					
					 It is the precious fruition of his wise leadership that the DPRK is demonstrating its might as the satellite manufacturing and launching state and nuclear weapons state.
					
					 He will live forever with the ever-victorious WPK leading the general advance of the Korean people to build a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The Lao papers Vatelao on June 10 and Vientiane Mai on June 12 and the Ugandan paper Sun Rise on June 13 carried articles praising him for turning the WPK into the ever-victorious iron-willed party and the DPRK into the political, ideological and military power no one dares provoke, holding high the banner of Juche and Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Romanian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Romanian Political Party Leader 
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, posted an article on its website "Juche Idea" on June 10 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The article titled "Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of WPK" said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il gave a scientific exposition of the position and role of the working class party in the revolutionary struggle and construction work and, on its basis, created a good example in building a revolutionary party of Juche type. 
					
					 He developed the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and saw to it that the party building and activities were conducted as required by the Juche idea, thus turning the WPK into the party of the leader and invincible steel-strong party. 
					
					 The immortal exploits he performed in building the WPK are a valuable textbook to be learned by the progressive political parties of the world. 
					
					 The victorious history of the WPK is being firmly inherited by HE Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the idea and cause of the preceding leaders. 
					
					 The Socialist Party of Romania believes that the WPK would achieve bigger successes in the struggle to reunify Korea and build a thriving nation, meeting all the challenges of the imperialists, under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Germany, Switzerland and Colombia on June 9 and 14 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, said:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the invincible party. 
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically advancing along the road of socialism despite the imperialists' moves. It is because he laid the eternal foundation for prosperity of the country with his unique Songun politics. 
					
					 The exploits he performed for the Korean revolution will be immortal. 
					
					 The Communist Party of Germany will positively support the just cause of the WPK led by Comrade Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, praised President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for firmly preserving the Juche character and national identity and thus surely guaranteeing the independent development of the country and nation and winning a brilliant victory in the revolution and construction. 
					
					 Jairo Gonzalez Trujillo, president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, said that the future of the WPK is rosy thanks to the exploits Kim Jong Il performed in the party building and the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar in Germany.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
						
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Dhaka City, Bangladesh.
					 The work, made public on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), clarifies the idea that the Juche philosophy is an original one which evolved and systemized its inherent principles and a revolutionary and popular one which truly serves the purpose of the struggle for the independence of the popular masses.
					
					 It also indicates tasks to study, explain and disseminate the Juche philosophy as intended the Workers' Party of Korea and thoroughly apply it to revolutionary practice.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bangladeshi Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Lauded by Bangladeshi Personage
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, peerless great men.
					 A ceremony for releasing Kim Jong Il's work was held at a publishing house in Dhaka City, Bangladesh on June 12. At the ceremony the chairman said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea to brightly indicate the road ahead of humankind and realized the centuries-old aspiration of the Korean people to live in a new world free from all sorts of exploitation and subordination.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il glorified the revolutionary idea of the President through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He developed in depth the Juche idea founded by the President and systematized it, seeing to it that it sheds its rays as the great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 I am convinced that the Korean people would achieve big successes in their struggle to build a thriving nation and reunify the country peacefully under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita campo de construccion de la Avenida de Cientificos Wisong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita campo de construccion de la Avenida de Cientificos Wisong
						
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el campo de construccion de la Avenida de Cientificos Wisong.
					Recorriendo varios puntos, se entero del estado de construccion.
					
					Se puso muy satisfecho de que a lo largo del campo de construccion, se creara la sorprendente velocidad de construccion, la de Corea, en el fragor de la emulacion colectiva.
					
					Hay que usar eficientemente la superficie de la zona de viviendas, senalo y continuo que los cientificos se pondrian complacidos si se les acondicionan el huerto y el invernadero entre las viviendas.
					
					Instruyo acabar antes de la estacion de lluvias el ordenamiento de las zonas perifericas al impulsar simultaneamente acorde a la velocidad de construccion la siembra de plantas trepadoras y arboles de buena variedad y la construccion de la vialidad de manzanas y la acera.
					
					Cuando estuvo en varias viviendas de los edificios no.5 y no.9, califico de comoda la estructura interna de ellas y evaluo que los constructores militares ejecutan bien la obra segun el diseno aprobado por el partido.
					
					Para entregar a los cientificos las viviendas impecables, hace falta levantar todas las construcciones segun la idea de nuestro partido de conceder importancia a la ciencia y la de estetica arquitectonica del Juche, enseno.
					
					Destaco que se debe prestar en esta obra la atencion primordial a la garantia de calidad y construir a perfeccion los edificios bajo la consigna !Responsabilicemonos de la calidad mil anos y la garanticemos diez mil anos!
					
					La gran reserva de creacion e innovaciones y la llave principal de la creacion de milagros residen en movilizar la potencial espiritual de las masas, senalo e indico intensificar la campana ideologica y la de propaganda y agitacion.
					
					Recordando que el partido prometio a los cientificos concluir la construccion hasta el dia conmemorativo de fundacion del partido de este ano, expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que la Avenida de Cientificos Wisong se construira magnificamente en el plazo previsto.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, secretario del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, el teniente general de fuerzas terrestres, Ma Won Chun, director de diseno del CDN, y el teniente general de fuerzas terrestres, Kim Jong Gwan, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Estadio Primero de Mayo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Estadio Primero de Mayo
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la reconstruccion del Estadio Primer de Mayo.
					Al recorrer varios lugares del estadio se entero detalladamente del estado de la obra y dio instrucciones para acelerar la reconstruccion.
					
					Evaluo a los constructores quienes registran innovaciones en cada objeto encargado.
					
					Dijo que el estadio Primero de Mayo donde estan impregnadas las hazanas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il es el importante que hace gran aporte al desarrollo de deporte del pais y la vida cultural del pueblo y subrayo que deben reconstruirlo magnificamente como simbolo de las instalaciones deportivas de nuestro pais conforme a la figura de un Estado civilizado.
					
					Destaco que para reconstruirlo como el moderno estadio digno de enorgullecerse en el mundo, hay que realizar de modo creativo e innovador la obra con la vision autoctona y mundial.
					
					Al indicar uno tras otro los objetos a que deben ser concentradas las fuerzas en la reconstruccion, apunto que cuando se construyan magnificamente graderias, el suelo del estadio e instalaciones de servicio de distintos generos sera posible convertir el estadio Primero de Mayo en la instalacion deportiva que muestra la autoctona arquitectura.
					
					Destaco que deben acabar con la reconstruccion del estadio hasta el dia conmemorativo de la fundacion del PTC de este ano y expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que los constructores terminaran cualitativamente en el tiempo fijado la obra conforme a la demanda del CC del Partido.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, secretario del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, el teniente general de fuerzas terrestres, Ma Won Chun, director de diseno del CDN y el teniente general de fuerzas terrestres, Kim Jong Gwan, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Felipe VI
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Felipe VI
						
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion a Felipe VI por su coronacion al trono al rey de Espana.
					El remitente expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Espana se ampliaran y se desarrollaran conforme a los intereses y el deseo comunes de los pueblos de los dos paises.

articles.title: Presidente de AP de Siria se reune con delegacion de RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente de AP de Siria se reune con delegacion de RPDC
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Asamblea Popular de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Mohammad Jihad Al Laham departio el dia 19 en la sede de la AP con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el canciller Ri Su Yong que le hizo una visita de cortesia.
					En la ocasion, el presidente subrayo que las relaciones camaraderiles entre los dos paises, preparadas por el Presidente Hafez Al-Assad y los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il se heredan y se desarrollan invariablemente por el Presidente Bashar al-Assad y Su Excelencia Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					El resultado de las elecciones presidenciales, efectuadas recientemente, manifesto fehacientemente que se unieron con firmeza el Presidente Bashar al-Assad y el pueblo sirio, senalo.
					
					El condeno las maniobras cada dia mas abiertas de la aplicacion de pauta de doble rasero de EE.UU. y el Occidente que violan la ley internacional, intervienen en los asuntos internos de los paises independientes y atentan los intereses de estos.
					
					Expreso la voluntad de fortalecer tambien en el futuro al igual en el pasado la cooperacion con los amistosos amigos coreanos en las escenas internacionales.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes las personalidades de la AP y del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y Expatriados de Siria y el embajador coreano acreditado en este pais.
